directions: Mix all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Bring to boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat; simmer until sauce thickens and is reduced to 2 cups, stirring frequently, about 15 minutes. Cool completely before using. (Can be made 1 week ahead. Cover and chill.)
ingredients: 2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco)
A smoke-flavored liquid seasoning that is available at specialty foods stores and at many supermarkets.
title: Beer and Molasses Barbecue Sauce
